revised_title: Internal Structure and Function of the Human Urethra and Corpus Spongiosum
tldr: The author, Everard Home, examines the internal structure of the human urethra and corpus spongiosum using a microscope, revealing new insights into their composition and function. The study corrects previous misconceptions about the causes of urethral strictures and provides a more accurate understanding of the urethra's anatomy and the role it plays in urinary function.
